title: The Sufficient Loss Protocol
description: When an alien entity sneaks aboard a corporate spaceship, with no motive besides sabotaging the mission and murdering those aboard, commander Uzoma Ifiok launches an investigationâ€”despite knowing that the real danger isn't the one picking off her crew.At the Publisher's request, this title is being sold without Digital Rights Management Software (DRM) applied.
author: Kemi Ashing-Giwa
